text: “Midi mayang phwk khea dxk hrux sung khawkhraw khxng brrda phu kxn hna phwk khea khux klum chna khxng nuh læa khx ngxad læa khxng sa mud læa klum chn khx ngxi brxhim læa chaw mad yan læa cha wxal-mu ta fik at doythi brrda rx sul khxng phwk khea di na hlakthan tang «xan chad cæng mayang phwk khea chı wa xallxh nan ca xthrrm kæ phwk khea k hami tæthwa phwk khea xthrrm kætaw khxng phwk khea xeng tanghak”
